## Government Tender Announcement

### Tender Title
Phase 2 EZ899-241504: Building 103 Window Replacement at William Head Institution

### Reference and Solicitation Numbers
WS4403666856-Doc4452707398
WS4403666856

### Key Dates
Publication Date | 2024-02-21
Tender Closing Date | 2024-03-06T14:00:00
Amendment Date | 2024-03-05
Expected Contract Start Date | 2024-03-15
Expected Contract End Date | 2024-03-08

### Tender Status
Expired

### Goods and Services
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking work under this contract for window replacement at CSC William Head Institution Building 103 (6000 William Head Rd, Victoria, BC V9C 0B5). Suppliers are required to provide labour, materials, services, and equipment necessary for the project.

### Technical Specifications
The work under this contract comprises, but is not limited to:
- Window envelopes
- Commercial and office building renovation and repair services
- Window and door installation and erection services
- Window treatment installation service

### Trade and Commerce Agreements
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
- British Columbia

### Contact Information
